titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: STAFF GROUP STANDARD HOURS - Description

div.p: The standard hours per week for a full time assignment for a Staff Group.
Staff Groups have different standard hours (e.g. 37 standard hours per week for Community Medical/Dental staff, 37.5 standard hours per week for non-medical staff, etc).
For some Staff Groups, the standard working week is expressed as STAFF GROUP STANDARD SESSIONS.
